relation: The weather is very cold and heavy woolens are a must. Best time for honeymoon and ideal for enjoying snow. However, tourists travelling with kids or old people need to take extra precaution. Since this is an off-season, the rates for tour packages as well as hotels are comparatively lower than peak tourist months.

The weather is still cold and is ideal for sightseeing and enjoying adventures. Woolens are a must as the days are cold and nights can get very chilly. Tourists start to visit as official tourist season begins from this month. Snowfall will continue till the mid of this month. Extra care is requisite if kids or old people are accompanying.

The heat begins to warm the ambiance making the weather cool during the day and chilly during the night. This is the best time for all kinds of adventure activities. There will be no snowfall, but snow can be found on high altitudes.

The weather is pleasant and tourists come here to spend a few days away from the scorching heat that grips North India. The skies remain clear with cool breeze. Temperatures start to pick up towards the comfortably hot high season level. For snow, tourists need to go to higher altitudes.

The weather is moderate and tourists can enjoy the best of sightseeing. Adventure like trekking and boating too can be enjoyed. Sun shines through but the cool breezes are successful in maintaining the temperatures within bearable range. Tourists wanting to enjoy snow should to go higher altitudes which can be reached only via trekking.

The end of this month sees the advent of the monsoon season. The days are warm but nights are pleasant and is ideal for holidaying and indulging in adventure options. It will rarely rain and sunshine is guaranteed.

Rainfall is occasional, bringing the temperature down, however, unexpected rainfall can cause hindrance in travelling. July might not be the best time for enjoying adventure sports but the natural beauty is worth enjoying.
The sky remains covered with monsoon cloud. Pleasant days and cool nights with regular rainfalls are common. Natural greenery is at its best but indulging in adventure can be a challenge.

The best time to visit Nainital for sightseeing, adventure as well as leisure as the rainfall starts to diminish and will completely stop by the end of this month. Tourists interested in snow should go to much higher altitudes. Good time for enjoying boating at the lake.

The weather is pleasant during the day and cool during the night, perfect time for holidaying and adventures. This is one of the most popular tourist seasons and remains very crowded. This month is the major crowd puller and the prices for holiday packages as well as hotels are very high. So, make sure you book in advance. Winters will start from the end of this month.

Winter begins to descend, making the days cooler and night chillier. Perfect for trekking and other adventures and sightseeing. This is an ideal time for tourism as nature is at its best. Snow will start to accumulate on a slightly higher altitude.

Very cold and snow can be enjoyed from the end of this month. Woolens clothing is a must. If you are travelling with kids or old people, many precautionary measures needs to be adhered to. A popular month for enjoying honeymoon trip.

textAfterTable: View all photos Best Season: Mar - Jun Summer 15 to 30Â°C, Winter 0 to 24Â°C Best Season / Best time to visit Nainital Nainital is one of the most prominent hill stations in the country that welcome tourists any time in a year. However, the best time to visit Nainital is from February to November. Winter (October to February) offer a chilly climate with a maximum of 15Â°C and minimum going below 0Â°C. Heavy snowfalls are common during winters. This is an apt time for honeymooning so newly married couples can plan their honeymoon or book the best Nainital honeymoon package during this period. Summer (March to May) are very pleasant with temperature never crossing 27Â°C and minimum is about 10Â°C. This is the best time for Nainital tourism. Tourists can enjoy sightseeing and adventure activities. Monsoon (June to September) are occasional and brings out the best of the natural beauty.
